snippet: KEAN--Hamilton. The Board and Staff of NRDC mourn the loss of our cherished friend and committed environmentalist, Ham Kean. Ham served on the staff and board of NRDC for over 45 years and was also a board member of the NRDC Action Fund. His passion, dedication and altruism will be deeply missed. Daniel R. Tishman, Chair; Rhea Suh, President; Frances Beinecke, former President; John H. Adams, Founding Director & Trustee; Patricia Bauman, Chair, NRDC Action Fund 1/3
lead_paragraph: KEAN--Hamilton. The Board and Staff of NRDC mourn the loss of our cherished friend and committed environmentalist, Ham Kean. Ham served on the staff and board of NRDC for over 45 years and was also a board member of the NRDC Action Fund. His passion, dedication and altruism will be deeply missed. Daniel R. Tishman, Chair; Rhea Suh, President; Frances Beinecke, former President; John H. Adams, Founding Director & Trustee; Patricia Bauman, Chair, NRDC Action Fund 1/3
